TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CipherReference extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference
Public NotInheritable Class CipherReference Inherits EncryptedReference

summary.span: 表示 XML 加密中的 元素。

span.span: Represents the element in XML encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示``XML 加密中的元素。This class represents the `` element in XML encryption. 它标识源，处理时，将生成加密的数据。It identifies a source which, when processed, yields the encrypted data. 加密所引用的数据的实际``通过以下过程。The actual encrypted data referenced by the `` is obtained by the following process. ` URI`属性包含被取消引用统一资源标识符 (URI)。The ` URI` property contains a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that is dereferenced. 如果``元素还包含转换链中，生成的取消引用 URI 数据转换为指定以产生加密的数据。If the `` element also contains a transform chain, the data resulting from dereferencing the URI is transformed as specified to produce the encrypted data. 例如，如果加密的数据的 base64 编码的 XML 文档中，转换会指定 XPath 表达式后跟 base64 解码，因此可以提取加密的数据。For example, if the encrypted data is base64-encoded within an XML document, the transforms would specify an XPath expression followed by a base64 decoding so the encrypted data can be extracted. URI 和转换的语法是类似于 XML 数字签名。The syntax of the URI and transforms is similar to that of XML digital signatures. 但是，在 XML 数字签名，生成和验证处理相同的源数据开始，执行该转换的相同顺序。However, in XML digital signatures, both generation and validation processing start with the same source data and perform that transform in the same order. XML 加密中解密应用程序已加密的数据和指定的转换。In XML encryption, the decrypting application has only the encrypted data and the specified transforms. 转换将枚举中获取的加密的数据所需的顺序。The transforms are enumerated in the order necessary to obtain the encrypted data. **请注意**默认情况下，您不能取消引用从具有未知的来源，如从网站上，文件文档的密码引用由于属性是**null**。**Note** By default, you cannot dereference cipher references from documents with unknown sources, such as files from a Web site, because the property is **null**. 例如，当您尝试解密文件包含``元素，它引用在 Web 上的文件引发，即使请求由完全受信任的程序集。For example, when you attempt to decrypt a file containing a `` element that references a file on the Web, a is thrown, even if the request is made by a fully trusted assembly. 如果确定你要解密的文档可以是受信任，你可以使用以下代码来更改此行为完全受信任的应用程序：If you are sure the documents you are decrypting can be trusted, you can change this behavior for fully trusted applications by using the following code: ``` Evidence ev = new Evidence(); ev.AddHost (new Zone(SecurityZone.MyComputer)); EncryptedXml exml = new EncryptedXml(doc, ev); ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的新实例。The following code example creates a new instance of . [!code-cpp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建对象，它提供的参考信息对象。This constructor creates a object that provides reference information for a object. 参考信息提供加密数据的位置。The reference information provides the location of the encrypted data.

span.span: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the encrypted data.

summary.span: 使用指定的统一资源标识符 (URI) 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建对象使用指向加密数据统一资源标识符 (URI)。This constructor creates a object using a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that points to the encrypted data. 对象用来提供的参考信息对象。The object is then used to provide reference information for a object. 一个 URI 可用于指定包含加密的数据的 XML 文件。You can use a URI to designate an XML file containing encrypted data. 例如:For example: `String uri = "http://www.woodgrovebank.com/document.xml";` 部分 URI 还可用于指定是仅为一部分的 XML 文档进行加密。You can also use a partial URI to designate that only a portion of an XML document is to be encrypted. 例如，假设名为 document.xml XML 文档包含两个`MyForm`元素，如下面的 XML 代码示例中所示：For example, assume that an XML document named document.xml contains two `MyForm` elements as shown in the following XML code example: `` `` `` `` `` `` 可以对中的内容进行加密`Form2`使用 URI 如下所示：You can encrypt only the content in `Form2` using a URI such as the following: `String uri = "http://www.woodgrovebank.com/document.xml#Form2";` ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的新实例。The following code example creates a new instance of . [!code-cpp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/VB/example.vb#1)]
